text:
An early lockdown was termed as one of the greatest strategies devised by PM Modi to control the virus. 4 phases of the lockdown and almost 3 months later, the Govt has been proved miserably wrong as cases see an exponential rise.

#ModiBetrayedIndia https://t.co/bjal1Jwxx8
